article.name: weakened
article.contents: In the Weakened state, creatures suffer: - Disadvantage to Strength rolls - 50% penalty to damage from Strength attacks - Encumbrance TBD (if that's ever implemented)
article.bodyHtml:
In the Weakened state, creatures suffer:

  • Disadvantage to Strength rolls
  • 50% penalty to damage from Strength attacks
  • Encumbrance TBD (if that's ever implemented)
